channel.title: Comments on: i knew i seen my airsoft gun from somewhere
channel.description: Welcome to the home of Battlefield V! Your place for discussion, help, news, reviews, questions, screenshots, videos, gifs, and anything else BFV related! Battlefield V is developed by DICE and produced by EA. This subreddit is ran by dedicated fans of the series and has no affiliation with EA or DICE.

item.title: By: Dramatic_Metal_5245
item.dc:creator: Dramatic_Metal_5245
item.description: Is this an MP28 Airsoft Gun or MP18(i) Post-War C.G. Haenel Weimar Police Model? Snow Wolf makes the Post-War model I think. - I can’t really see the iron sights but that’s how you tell the difference. The MP28 has a range adjustable iron sight but he MP18(i) Police model has a fixed iron sight.
item.content:encoded:
Is this an MP28 Airsoft Gun or MP18(i) Post-War C.G. Haenel Weimar Police Model? Snow Wolf makes the Post-War model I think.
– I can’t really see the iron sights but that’s how you tell the difference. The MP28 has a range adjustable iron sight but he MP18(i) Police model has a fixed iron sight.
